subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Chivas USA, D.C. United, Houston and New England will be the United States representatives in the initial Concacaf Champions League. D.C. United and Houston are among eight teams that qualify directly for the first round, which opens Sept. 16-18. Chivas USA and New England are among 16 teams in a preliminary round to be played Aug. 26-28 and Sept. 2-4. The tournament will include four teams from Mexico; three teams from the Caribbean; two each from Costa Rica, El Salvador, Guatemala, Honduras and Panama; and one apiece from Canada, Belize and Nicaragua.
snippet: Chivas USA, D.C. United, Houston and New England will be the United States representatives in the initial Concacaf Champions League. D.C. United and Houston are among eight teams that qualify directly for the first round, which opens Sept. 16-18....
